app_architecture_Principles.title: Security-first
app_architecture_Principles.description: Ensuring what users entrust to the system remains safe

app_architecture_Principles.title: API-first
app_architecture_Principles.description: Ensuring the system is interoperable and uses the CPU closest to consumption.

app_architecture_Principles.title: Accessible-first
app_architecture_Principles.description: Ensuring the most people can use the system.

app_architecture_Principles.title: Open-first
app_architecture_Principles.description: Ensuring the most people are enabled to access the system's data.

app_architecture_Principles.title: Future-first
app_architecture_Principles.description: Ensuring the design is not narrowly focused on today's problems forgetting what could be done if there were no problems to focus on today.
